column7: This really tiny café has excellent pastries, very welcoming owners & you often meet nice people
column9: Just plain - but very good - coffee & tea, and delicious,home made pastries. The place is very small, but light and cosy, and it feels like at somebody's home. The atmosphere is relaxed and very friendly.

Idag hittade jag en lite pärla att fika på.

column7: Kretivitet och fika-mys i härlig kombination
column9: På Tiny Lumberjack Café kan du fika i en fantastiskt inspierande miljö och kreativa vibbar. Att sedan fikat är suveränt...More
